title: In Attempt At Turnaround, Yahoo's Marissa Mayer Hires Outside The Box
teaser: To recapture its old glow, Yahoo poached Google's highest-ranking woman, Marissa Mayer, in 2012. Carlos Watson, co-founder of Ozy.com, talks with NPR's Arun Rath about how Mayer has shaped the company since she took the job.
